metadata.Title: CVE-2020-12362 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Integer overflow in the firmware for some Intel(R) Graphics Drivers for Windows * before version 26.20.100.7212 and before Linux kernel version 5.5 may allow a privileged user to potentially enable an escalation of privilege via local access.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> per Intel, this was fixed by a firmware update. v49.0.1 of the firmware is required. The new firmware requires a kernel patch: c784e5249e773689e38d2bc1749f08b986621a26

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
